description: Chant the glory of the Sun.
name: chants

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 Physical Save and Spell Save.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 light damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Fortitude

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 14%, 19%, 23%, 26%, 29% physical damage resistance.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 light damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Fortress

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 25% fire, lightning, acid and cold damage resistance.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 light damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Resistance

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, empowering your light and fire elemental attacks so that they do 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% additional damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 light damage to anything that attacks you.

Your lite radius is also increased by 2, 4, 5, 6, 6.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Light

description: Bind the power of the Moon into circles at your feet.
name: circles

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle increases your Defense by 18, 25, 30, 35, 38, and deals 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 darkness damage per turn to everyone else with in its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Shifting Shadows

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle lights up affected tiles, increases your positive energy by 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 each turn, and deals 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 light damage and 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 fire damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Blazing Light

talents.info_text: Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle protects you from silence effects while you remain in its radius, and silences everyone else who enters. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Circle of Sanctity

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 61%, 83%, 100%, 114%, 127%, and attempts to push all creatures other then yourself out of its radius, inflicting 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage and 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Warding

description: Your devotion allows you to combat your foes with indomitable determination.
name: combat

talents.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, doing 20, 34, 45, 54, 62 light damage at the cost of 3 positive energy for each blow dealt.

If you do not have enough positive energy, the sustain will have no effect.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Weapon of Light

talents.info_text: Designate a target as a martyr for 10 turns. When the martyr deals damage, it also damages itself for 18%, 29%, 35%, 40%, 44% of the damage dealt.
talents.name: Martyrdom

talents.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a melee attack, doing 150%, 167%, 180%, 191%, 201% damage.

The range will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Wave of Power

talents.info_text: Concentrate the power of the Sun into two blows; each blow does 120%, 137%, 150%, 161%, 171% of your weapon damage as light damage.
talents.name: Crusade

description: The moment of the Eclipse is the moment of Truth, when Sun and Moon are in tandem and the energies of the world hang in the balance. Intense focus allows the greatest Anorithils to harness these energies to unleash devastating forces...
name: eclipse

talents.info_text: Increases your spell critical chance by 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18%.
talents.name: Blood Red Moon

talents.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 26%, 39%, 49%, 55%, 61% for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Totality

talents.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 targets within radius 6, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 light damage or 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Corona

talents.info_text:
This powerful spell grants you 21, 29, 34, 38, 43 bonus invisibility, but converts 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 negative energy into positive energy each turn. Once your positive energy exceeds your negative energy, or you deactivate the talent, the effect ends in an explosion of light, converting all of your positive energy into damage and inflicting an additional 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 damage to everything in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality; all your damage is reduced by 50%.

You may not cast Twilight while this spell is active, and you should take off your light source; otherwise, others will spot you with ease.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Cunning, and the explosion damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Darkest Light

description: Bind the brilliant powers into glyphs to trap your foes.
name: glyphs

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be dazed for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
talents.name: Glyph of Paralysis

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will be hit by a blast that knocks them back and does 38, 54, 66, 77, 86 physical damage.

The glyph is a hidden trap (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glyph of Repulsion

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will trigger an explosion of light that does 38, 54, 66, 77, 86 damage to everyone within 1 tile.

The glyph is a hidden trap (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 30, 43, 52, 61, 68 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glyph of Explosion

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will be slowed by 29%, 38%, 47%, 56%, 65% for 5 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (38, 54, 66, 76, 85 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
talents.name: Glyph of Fatigue

description: Your devotion grants you additional protection.
name: guardian

talents.info_text:
Infuse your shield with light, healing you for 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 each time you take damage at the expense of up to 2 positive energy.

If you do not have any positive energy, the effect will not trigger.

The healing done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shield of Light

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage, and with a shield strike doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Brandish

talents.info_text:
Retribution negates half of all damage you take while it is active. Once Retribution has negated 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 damage, your shield will explode in a burst of light, inflicting damage equal to the amount negated in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 and deactivating the talent.

The amount absorbed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Retribution

talents.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent and setting your hit points to 103, 158, 209, 257, 301.
talents.name: Second Life

description: Chant the glory of the Moon.
name: hymns

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, empowering your dark elemental attacks so that they do 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%, 32% additional darkness damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Shadows

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, granting you infravision up to 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 grids, stealth detection (+9, +12, +14, +17, +18 power), and invisibility detection (+22, +29, +35, +41, +45 power).

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The stealth and invisibility detection, as well as the on-hit damage, will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Detection

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, granting you 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 55% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The on-hit damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Perseverance

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 7.1, 4.8, 3.6, 2.9, 2.4 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Moonlight

description: Invoke the power of the light to heal and mend.
name: light

talents.info_text:
An invigorating ray of Sunlight shines on you, healing your body for 306, 415, 500, 571, 635 life.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Healing Light

talents.info_text:
A magical zone of Sunlight appears around you, healing and shielding all within radius 3 for 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 per turn and increasing healing effects on everyone within by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%. The effect lasts for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

It also lights up the affected zone.

The amount healed will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Bathe in Light

talents.info_text:
A protective shield forms around you that lasts for up to 10 turns and negates 328, 445, 535, 612, 680 damage.

The total damage the barrier can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Barrier

talents.info_text:
Places you under the protection of Light itself. For 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, the light heals 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 life and removes a single negative effect from you.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Providence

talents.info_text: Instantly travel to your jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 15, 16, 18, 19 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate: Teleport To

talents.info_text: Create a second shadow jumpgate at your location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 15, 16, 18, 19 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate Two

talents.info_text: Instantly travel to your second jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 15, 16, 18, 19 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate Two: Teleport To

description: Call the fury of the Stars and the Moon to destroy your foes.
name: star fury

talents.info_text:
Focuses the power of the Moon into a beam of shadows, doing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 damage.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Moonlight Ray

talents.info_text:
Invokes a blast of shadows that deals 73, 98, 118, 135, 150 darkness damage, and leaves a radius 3 field that does 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 darkness damage per turn for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shadow Blast

talents.info_text:
A surge of twilight pulses from you, doing 39, 70, 93, 113, 130 light and 39, 70, 93, 113, 130 darkness damage to all others within radius 2.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Twilight Surge

talents.info_text:
A star falls on a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 area, doing 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 darkness damage on impact and stunning all within the area for 4 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Starfall

description: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.
name: sun

talents.info_text:
Calls the power of the Sun into a searing lance, doing 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 damage to the target and leaving a spot on the ground for 4 turns that does 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 light damage to anyone within it.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Searing Light

talents.info_text:
Invokes the Sun to cause a flare within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, blinding your foes for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns and lighting up your immediate area (radius 4, 6, 8, 8, 10).

At level 3 it will also do 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 light damage within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sun Flare

talents.info_text:
Call forth the Sun to summon a fiery beam, burning all targets in a line for 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 fire damage.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Firebeam

talents.info_text:
Conjures a furious burst of Sunlight, dealing 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 light damage to all around you in a radius of 3.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sunburst

description: Stand between the darkness and the light, harnessing both.
name: twilight

talents.info_text:
You stand between the darkness and the light, allowing you to convert 15 positive energy into 89, 142, 186, 225, 260 negative energy.

Learning this talent will change the default level of positive and negative energies to 22%, 28%, 32%, 34%, 36% of their maximum. Each turn, the energies will slowly fall/rise to this value, instead of 0.

The negative energy gain will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Twilight

talents.info_text:
Create a shadow jumpgate at your current location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 15, 16, 18, 19 tiles of it.

Note that any stairs underneath the jumpgate will be unusable while the spell is sustained, and you may need to cancel this sustain in order to leave certain locations.

At talent level 4, you learn to create and sustain a second jumpgate.
talents.name: Jumpgate

talents.info_text:
Let out a mental cry that shatters the will of your targets within radius 3, confusing (20%, 35%, 41%, 45%, 48% to act randomly) them for 9, 10, 11, 12, 12 turns.

The duration will improve with your Cunning.
talents.name: Mind Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a shadowy copy of a hostile target of up to medium, medium, big, big, huge size. The copy will attack its progenitor immediately and lasts for 16, 16, 17, 18, 18 turns.

The duplicate has 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% of the target's life, 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% all damage resistance, +50% darkness resistance and -50% light resistance.

The duration, life and all damage resistance scale with your Cunning and this ability will not work on bosses.
talents.name: Shadow Simulacrum
